name: logseq-serendipity
author: Qwxlea
description: Bring some serendipity to your graph

scripts.preview: gh-social-preview.py -t "Logseq Serendipity Plugin" -e "Some of the greatest things, as I understand, they have come about by serendipity, the greatest discoveries" -i "background.png" -f "PlayfairDisplay-VariableFont_wght.ttf" -b "Montserrat-VariableFont_wght.ttf" -l icon2.png -v "$npm_package_version"
